page.title: 20Tuesday - by a 10 year old
page.content: I get up at 8.30, dress and have breakfast, brush my hair,put my coat on, get my bag and go to school at 9. A teacher takes us from the playground across the road to school. In assembly all the Juniors play recorders. A teacher leads prayers. We work in class until 10.40, we play until 11, and work until 12, which is dinner time. We all wash our hands and the teacher checks them. After dinner we go out to play again. From 1.15 we have 10 minutes reading, and work until 2.45. We play until 3, work until 3.15, and have a story or do miming until 3.45, time to go home. I am in the third year juniors. After school I go to my friend's house and her mother takes to Brownies at 6. We come back at 7.15pm. I watch some television, and go to bed at approximately 10pm. Lindsey Lumbard.
